oily.description: Gentle, oil-control products for young skin
tips: Use gentle, non-comedogenic products
Avoid harsh scrubs and alcohol-based toners
Always wear sunscreen, even on cloudy days
Don't over-wash - twice daily is sufficient

dry.description: Hydrating products for young dry skin
products: Aveeno Calm + Restore Oat Gel Moisturizer
tips: Use creamy, hydrating cleansers
Apply moisturizer while skin is still damp
Look for ingredients like hyaluronic acid and ceramides
Avoid hot water when washing face
Use different products for different areas
Apply lighter products on oily areas
Use richer products on dry areas
Don't skip moisturizer on any area

oily.description: Simple, effective products for young male skin
tips: Keep it simple - don't over-complicate your routine
Use products designed for men's thicker skin
Don't skip moisturizer even if skin feels oily
Shave carefully to avoid irritation

dry.description: Hydrating products for young male skin
products: Jack Black Intense Therapy Lip Balm
tips: Use gentle, hydrating cleansers
Apply moisturizer after shaving
Look for products with ceramides
Don't use harsh aftershaves

combination.description: Balanced products for combination male skin
tips: Use different products for different areas
Apply lighter products on oily areas
Use richer products on dry areas
Don't skip moisturizer on any area

Consider adding vitamin C in the morning
